title: Executive Order 12429-President's Private Sector Survey on Cost Control in the Federal Government
content: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and laws of the United States of America, including the Federal Advisory Committee Act, as amended (5 U.S.C. App. I), and in order to extend the life of the President's Private Sector Survey on Cost Control in the Federal Government, it is hereby ordered that Section 4(b) of Executive Order No. 12369 of June 30, 1982, as amended, is further amended to read: "The Committee shall terminate on October 30, 1983, unless sooner extended.".
[Filed with the Office of the Federal Register, 11:29 a.m., June 29, 1983]
citation: Ronald Reagan, Executive Order 12429-President's Private Sector Survey on Cost Control in the Federal Government Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/263222
